body_html: Just my 2 cents. Happy for this decision. I think that a huge effort should be placed in tutorials: the hugest difficulty I am having -- and some colleagues with me -- is that the documentation that you can find is quite lousy and not very self-contained. I would be happy to help, of course.

body: Just my 2 cents. Happy for this decision. I think that a *huge* effort should be placed in tutorials: the hugest difficulty I am having -- and some colleagues with me -- is that the documentation that you can find is quite lousy and not very self-contained. I would be happy to help, of course.
